title: BeamNGpy 19.1 (and maybe 1.20) breaks compatibility with BeamNG 1.7.0.1
body:
When running BeamNG.research 1.7.0.1 using beamngpy 1.19.1

Note that the same code works with BeamNG.tech 0.21.3.0.

Probably we should warn the user that BeamNG.research 1.7.0.1 is supported only up to 1.18?

The console log is attached below:

```
12.08113|D|GELua.core_modmanager.initDB|mountEntry -- /mods/beamngpy.zip:  : beamngpy
